text: India participated in World Games 2005 in Duisburg, Germany. The nation sent the smallest contingent out of any participating nation, with only two athletes going. No medals were won.http://www.duisburg.de/worldgames_archiv/en/news/news.php@id=448 ==Athletes== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! Name ! Sport |- | Pankaj Advani || Billiards |- | Amit Chaudharyhttp://www.duisburg.de/worldgames_archiv/en/teilnehmer/teilnehmer.php@id=12731 || Bodybuilding - 75 kg |} ==References== 2005 Category:2005 in Indian sport
title: India at the 2005 World Games
